data.text: @tshepomorajane6 @_ArriveAlive A speed measuring exercise (speed trap) may not be set up within 300m of the COMMENCEMENT of a speed limit ZONE. e.g. where the speed limit is reduced from 100km/h to 80km/h. This does not mean that it may not be set up within 300m of a speed limit SIGN.

@_ArriveAlive @JPSAorg So if that sign says 80km and you're on 90km just after it like in the picture traffic official pulls you over is that legal? Shouldn't it be 10 to 15 meters after a board sign??
